languages.text: "Если Вашей Светлости будет угодно, я передам, что вы запрашиваете официальные извинения за имевший ранее место акт возмутительной дерзости".

traits.locale_text: "Я передам им, что вы запрашиваете официальных извинений, прежде чем мы начнем совет".

languages.text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."
languages.original_text: "Если Вашей Светлости будет угодно, я передам, что вы запрашиваете официальные извинения за имевший ранее место акт возмутительной дерзости".

traits.locale_text: "If your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} pleases, I will convey them your request for official apologies for the act of outrageous impudence that took place before."
"If your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} pleases, I will convey them your request for official apologies for the act of outrageous impudence that took place before."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will pass on to them a request for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will pass on to them a request for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."
"If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

languages.text: “如果大人您有这个打算，我可以要求他们对之前的可耻行为进行正式道歉。”
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

traits.locale_text: “如果大人您有这个打算，我可以要求他们对之前的可耻行为进行正式道歉。”

languages.text: « Si Votre Seigneurie le souhaite, je leur transmettrai une demande d'excuses officielles pour la scandaleuse insolence dont ils ont fait preuve. »
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

traits.locale_text: « Si Votre Seigneurie le souhaite, je leur transmettrai une demande d'excuses officielles pour la scandaleuse insolence dont ils ont fait preuve. »

languages.text: "Wenn es Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünscht, werde ich um eine offizielle Entschuldigung für ihre ungeheuerliche Respektlosigkeit ersuchen."
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn es Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünscht, werde ich um eine offizielle Entschuldigung für ihre ungeheuerliche Respektlosigkeit ersuchen."
"Wenn es Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünscht, werde ich ihnen ein Ersuchen um offizielle Entschuldigung für ihre ungeheuerliche Unverschämtheit zukommen lassen."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si lo desea, les exigiré una disculpa formal por el ultraje que ha acontecido».
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, si lo desea, les exigiré una disculpa formal por el ultraje que ha acontecido».

languages.text: 「陛下、お望みであれば、今回の不遜極まる行為に対し、公式謝罪を要求する旨を通達いたします」
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、お望みであれば、今回の不遜極まる行為に対し、公式謝罪を要求する旨を通達いたします」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, dilerseniz bu çirkin saygısızlıktan pişman olduklarına dair resmî bir açıklama yapmalarını talep edebilirim."
languages.original_text: "If Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} so desires, I will relay a demand for an official apology for the act of outrageous impudence that took place."
